snippet: Representatives of the actor Robert De Niro and the town of Gardiner, N.Y., came to an agreement over the assessed value of his 98-acre property and taxes due.
abstract: Representatives of actor Robert De Niro reach settlement with town of Gardiner, NY, over value of his 98-acre property there; property's $6 million assessment has been in dispute for three years, leading to lengthy court case about property taxes.
lead_paragraph: Representatives of the actor Robert De Niro and the town of Gardiner, N.Y., came to an agreement over the assessed value of his 98-acre property and taxes due.

headline.main: De Niro and New York Town End Fight Over Property Taxes
headline.print_headline: Upstate Town and De Niro Reach a Deal on His Taxes
